trending.title: Agent Lightning: Train ANY AI Agents with Reinforcement Learning
trending.abstract: Submitted by daixufang  Agent Lightning is a flexible RL framework for training LLMs in various agents, using a hierarchical RL algorithm and decoupling execution from training to handle complex interactions. 8 authors · Published on Aug 5,

trending.title:
Thinking with Video: Video Generation as a Promising Multimodal
  Reasoning Paradigm
trending.abstract: Submitted by lkdhy  The "Thinking with Video" paradigm enhances multimodal reasoning by integrating video generation models, demonstrated through the Video Thinking Benchmark and improved performance on both vision and text tasks. OpenMOSS

trending.title:

  Ultra-Compact Vision-Language Model

trending.title: Continuous Autoregressive Language Models

trending.title: TradingAgents: Multi-Agents LLM Financial Trading Framework
